name: Unchained (itch) (alecmtd)
description:
In this game, you will play as a knight who tries to escape from a castle where he is a prisoner. To achieve this, you will have to solve puzzles and overcome a large number of obstacles.

In this game, you will have to:

  • Escape from guards
  • Not fall into the lava
  • Pass many obstacles
  • And much more...
